mapper.insert: insert into service_order_content (ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, MOBILE_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_TITLE, ORDER_INFO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMT, ORDER_BONUS, PAY_AMT, PAY_BONUS, PAY_RIGHT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderBonus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payBonus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update service_order_content set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NO = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUP_NO = #{supNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_NO = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TITLE = #{orderTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_INFO = #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMT = #{orderAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_BONUS = #{orderBonus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_AMT = #{payAmt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_BONUS = #{payBonus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_RIGHT = #{payRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, MOBILE_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_TITLE, ORDER_INFO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMT, ORDER_BONUS, PAY_AMT, PAY_BONUS, PAY_RIGHT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE from service_order_content where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, MOBILE_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_TITLE, ORDER_INFO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMT, ORDER_BONUS, PAY_AMT, PAY_BONUS, PAY_RIGHT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE from service_order_content
